description:
Game of Thrones will officially come to an end for fans when it returns in 2019 with its eighth and final season. But for the cast and crew, the end is already beginning. Kit Harington revealed that the cast has already done a table read of the series finale—and it left him in tears.对粉丝们来说，当《权力的游戏》于2019年播出第八季也就是最后一季的时候，权游也就正式结束了。不过对演员和工作人员来说，结局已经开始了。据基特·哈灵顿透露，剧组已经坐在一起读过最终季的剧本了，而且当时他还流泪了。

“We had a read through last week in fact, so I know everything now,” he explained. “I cried at the end. You have to remember that eight years of it—no one really cares about it more than us.””其实，上个周我们把剧本通读了一遍，所以现在我知道所有的内容，”他解释道。“最后我哭了。你一定还记得，这部剧我们拍了八年，没有人会比我们更在乎它。”

So did he cry just because it's emotional to see such a huge part of your life come to an end or because the ending of Thrones is, in and of itself, tear-inducing?那么，他流泪是因为看到自己人生中这么重要的一部剧要完结了而激动不已，还是因为权游的结局本身十分催泪？

“It's been an institution longer than any other institution I've been in," he said. "School, drama school, anything. I get a bit weepy thinking about it. It's going to be a strange year saying goodbye to everyone and having last scenes with this person and that person. Not only you’re attached to it, loads of people around the world are attached to it.”“我留在这个剧组的时间比我参与过的任何其他团体的时间都要长，”他说道。“学校，戏剧学院，任何事物。想到这一点（权游要结束了），我就有点想哭。这将会是拘谨的一年，要跟每个人说再见，要跟这个人和那个人一起拍摄最后的场景。不仅仅是你喜欢这部剧，全世界有许多人都喜欢这部剧。”

Yes. We are attached. Any hints about Season 8, Kit?是的，我们都喜欢这部剧。所以，基特，关于第八季有任何提示吗？

"[I was told], 'Don’t tell them you’re filming. Don't take pictures in Belfast. Don't do all of that,'" he said. "It’s on lockdown !"“我被告知，不要告诉他们你在拍摄。不要在贝尔法斯特拍照。所有的那一切都不要做，”他说道。“我们对这一切进行了一级封锁！”

So basically, Jon Snow finally knows something and now he won't tell us.所以，说白了，琼恩·雪诺最终知道了一些事情，但他现在不会告诉我们。

（翻译：Dlacus）

title: 雪诺透露已知《权游》最终剧情，或是悲剧？

description:
On Thursday night, Taylor Swift dropped the third song from her Reputation era. Like everything she's ever released (but especially everything she's released since purging her social media footprint), she teased the track on Instagram.周二晚，泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）发布了新专辑《Reputation》的第三支单曲。跟以往发布新曲一样（尤其是泰勒关闭社交媒体后），泰勒在Instagram上打趣了这支单曲。

Now, the full song is out, complete with lyric video and it's actually a nice bridge between the allegedly-deceased Old Taylor and the snake-clad New Taylor.目前发布的整支单曲包括歌词视频，这支单曲连接着衰落的旧泰勒和蛇族新泰勒。

Yes, the lyric video stays true to the Reputation aesthetic—complete with faded cross-sections of newsprint (the media covers Taylor a lot, thus impacting her reputation, in case you hadn't heard). 歌词视频完全符合《Reputation》的风格，印在褪色的半截报纸上（报纸报道了很多关于泰勒的事，对她的名誉影响很大）。。

There are also sweet notes and references to spying a stranger across a crowded room and the whole song is, at its core, about being smitten (even though Narrator Taylor had a boyfriend at the time).还有一些甜言蜜语，以及关于监视拥挤房间里陌生人的描述。整首歌的核心是爱（当时泰勒还有男朋友）。

All in all, "Gorgeous" feels like New Taylor's take on Old Taylor's sugary unrequited love ballad, "Enchanted."总之，《Gorgeous》就像新泰勒用来取代旧泰勒的单恋蜜曲民谣《Enchanted》的新作。

（翻译：阿忙）

title: 霉霉最新单曲《gorgeous》，满满恋爱少女风！
